@font-face {
    font-family: 'Cascadia Code';
    src: url('./onelight/fonts/CascadiaCode.woff2') format('woff2');
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;
}

@font-face {
    font-family: 'å–µå­—æœæ±ä½“';
    src: url('./onelight/fonts/MiaoZi-GuoZhiTi.woff2') format('woff2');
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;
}

:root {
    --bg-color: #f2f2f2;
    --code-bg-color: #282c34;
    --text-color: #333;
    --primary-btn-text-color: #fff;
    --window-border: 1px solid #eee;
    --active-file-bg-color: #eee;
    --active-file-text-color: inherit;
    --active-file-border-color: var(--main-red);
    --side-bar-bg-color: var(--bg-color);
    --item-hover-bg-color: hsla(0, 0%, 90%, .59);
    --item-hover-text-color: var(--main-red);
    --monospace: monospace;
    --select-text-bg-color: #3b3e4d;
    /* ä¸»é¢˜è‰² */
    --main-blue: #166ff3;
    --main-red: #ff6b6b;
    --main-green: #2ed573;
    --main-purple: #c94ae9;
    --main-yellow: #f9b03d;
    --light-color: #b2b2b2;
    --code--bg-color: #282c34;
    --code--bg-color-light: #3d404e;
    /* å­—ä½“ */
    --main-font-family: "Cascadia Code", "å–µå­—æœæ±ä½“", consolas, "å¾®è½¯é›…é»‘", "PingFang SC", "Microsoft YaHei", sans-serif;
    /* æ‚¬æµ® */
    --item-bg-color-red: #f4433638;
    --item-bg-color-blue: #42a5f542;
    /* é˜´å½± */
    --box-shadow: 0px 4px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, .1);
    --transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
    /* å·¦åˆ°å³é€æ˜æ¸å˜ */
    --gradient-color: linear-gradient(to right, white, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0));
    /* githubè­¦å‘Šæ¡† */
    --tip-color: #1f883d;
    --tip-border: solid 0.5px #1f883d94;
    --tip-bg-color: #f0f9eb;
    --note-color: #0969da;
    --note-border: solid 0.5px #0969da94;
    --warning-color: #faad14;
    --warning-border: solid 0.5px #faad1494;
    --caution-color: #cf222e;
    --caution-border: solid 0.5px #cf222e94;
    --important-color: #8250df;
    --important-border: solid 0.5px #8250df94;
    /* æ”¾å¤§å€æ•° */
    /* --transform: scale(1); */
}


body {
    font-family: var(--main-font-family)
}

::-moz-selection {
    color: #fff
}

::-webkit-selection {
    background: #b981d1;
    color: #fff
}

#write {
    letter-spacing: 0;
    /* max-width: 914px; */
    text-align: left
}

#write,
#write p {
    font-size: 16px
}

#write p {
    line-height: 26px;
    margin: 0;
    padding-bottom: 8px;
    padding-top: 8px
}


#write input[type=checkbox] {
    left: -3px;
    margin-right: 5px;
    margin-top: calc(1em - 2px)
}

#write h2,
#write h3,
#write h4,
#write h5,
#write h6 {
    color: #000;
    font-weight: 700;
    margin: .72em 0;
    padding: 0
}

#write h2:hover:before {
    bottom: .2rem;
    content: "H2"
}

#write h3:hover:before {
    bottom: .2rem;
    content: "H3"
}

#write h4:hover:before {
    bottom: .2rem;
    content: "H4"
}

#write h5:hover:before {
    bottom: .2rem;
    content: "H5"
}

#write h6:hover:before {
    bottom: .2rem;
    content: "H6"
}

#write h2:hover:before,
#write h3:hover:before,
#write h4:hover:before,
#write h5:hover:before,
#write h6:hover:before {
    border-radius: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    color: #166ff36e;
    float: none;
    font-size: .9rem;
    font-variant: "small-caps";
    font-weight: 700;
    left: auto;
    line-height: 20px;
    padding: 0;
    position: absolute;
    right: calc(100% + 10px);
    vertical-align: baseline;
}

#write h2 {
    font-size: 1.7rem;
    margin: 1em 0
}

#write h2 span {
    color: #136ef7;
    font-weight: 700;
    padding: 3px 10px 1px
}

#write h3 {
    font-size: 1.5rem
}

#write h4 {
    font-size: 1.25rem
}

#write h5,
#write h6 {
    font-size: 1rem
}

#write ol,
#write ul {
    /* color: var(--main-red); */
    margin-bottom: 8px;
    margin-top: 8px;
    padding-left: 40px
}

#write ul ul,
#write ol ol,
#write ul ol,
#write ol ul {
    padding-left: 30px; /* é€‚å½“å¢åŠ ç¼©è¿›ï¼Œç¡®ä¿åµŒå¥—å¯è§† */
}

#write ul {
    list-style-type: disc; /* ç¬¬ä¸€çº§ä½¿ç”¨å®å¿ƒåœ†ç‚¹ */
}

#write ul ul {
    list-style-type: circle; /* ç¬¬äºŒçº§ä½¿ç”¨ç©ºå¿ƒåœ† */
}

#write ul ul ul {
    list-style-type: square; /* ç¬¬ä¸‰çº§ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å— */
}

#write ul ul ul ul {
    list-style-type: disc; /* ç¬¬å››çº§æ¢å¤å®å¿ƒåœ† */
}


#write ol {
    list-style-type: decimal; /* 1, 2, 3 */
}

#write ol ol {
    list-style-type: lower-alpha; /* a, b, c */
}

#write ol ol ol {
    list-style-type: lower-roman; /* i, ii, iii */
}

#write ol ol ol ol {
    list-style-type: upper-alpha; /* A, B, C */
}


#write li section {
    font-size: 15px
}

#write strong {
    color: #136ef7;
    font-weight: 700
}

/* å¼•ç”¨å— */
#write blockquote {
    background: var(--gradient-color);
    backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
    border-bottom-right-radius: 10px;
    border-left: 5px solid var(--main-blue);
    border-top-right-radius: 10px;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, .2);
    color: #606060;
    font-size: .9em;
    margin-bottom: 16px;
    margin-top: 16px;
    overflow: auto;
    -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
    padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px;
    transition: var(--transition)
}

#write blockquote:hover {
    background: #fff;
    box-shadow: 0 8px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, .3);
    /* transform: var(--transform); */
    backdrop-filter: unset;
}

#write blockquote p {
    line-height: 26px
}


#write a {
    margin: 3px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid var(--main-purple);
    color: var(--main-purple);
    font-weight: 700;
    text-decoration: none
}

#write code {
    background-color: #ebebeb;
    color: #eb4c37;
    font-family: var(--main-font-family);
    font-size: 14px
}

#write li code,
#write p code,
#write span code {
    border-radius: 4px;
    margin: 0 2px;
    padding: 2px 4px;
    word-break: break-all;
    word-wrap: break-word
}

/* å›¾ç‰‡ */
#write img {
    border: 0;
    border-radius: 5px;
    box-shadow: 0 3px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, .2);
    display: block;
